ARABIC: إِن يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَىَّ إِلَّآ أَنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: It is only revealed to me that I am a clear warner.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Only this has been revealed to me that I am a distinct warner.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: I am told (about matters) by means of revelation only because I am a clear warner.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: I have only received revelation to give you plain warning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “I receive only the divine revelations, that I am purely a clear Herald of Warning.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Only this has been revealed to me, that I am a plain warner."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Naught is revealed to me save that I am a plain warner.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: This alone is revealed to me, that I am only a clear warner.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: It is revealed unto me only that I may be a plain warner.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: it has only been revealed to me that I am a plain warner."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Naught is revealed Unto me except that I am a warner manifest.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: All that is revealed to me is that I am just a manifest warner.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Only this has been revealed to me: that I am to give warning plainly and publicly."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Only this has been inspired to me, that I am a plain warner."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: This alone is revealed to me, I am only a clear warner'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: It is only revealed to me that I am a clear warner.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: It has not been revealed to me except that I am a clear warner."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [38:70] All that is revealed to me is that I am just a plain warner’, one whose warning is clear.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: It is revealed unto me only that I may be a plain warner) a warning messenger addressing you in a language that you understand.
